snippet.title: Vane - Available Now
snippet.description:
Get Vane on PlayStation®4 now:
[Europe] https://bit.ly/2FtWOdg
[North America] https://bit.ly/2H7ovKy

In a forgotten and ruined land, a strange golden dust transforms a free-spirited bird into a lost child, setting off a chain of events that will reshape the world in unexpected ways. 

Set out on an epic story of transformation, where shifting between the perspectives of a bird and a child will be key to unravel the land's mysteries and create a path forward through the barren landscape. As you do so, the remnants of the world react to your passage, evolving and building into something altogether different.

Vane is OUT NOW on PlayStation®4.
